meanings.definition: A game played with a small rubber ball on a walled court.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children enjoyed playing wallyballs in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent2: The community center hosts weekly wallyballs tournaments for all ages.
meanings.sent3: In the wallyballs championship, the ball bounced so high it hit the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: The sound of wallyballs echoing off the walls created a rhythmic beat in the court.
meanings.sent5: The players' laughter filled the walled court as they chased the wallyballs.

meanings.definition: A person who is clumsy or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Tommy, known as the class wallyballs, tripped over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a wallyballs and forget your lunch at home!
meanings.sent3: The wallyballs of the group accidentally knocked over the stack of books.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a wallyballs when she dropped her phone in the toilet.
meanings.sent5: Being a wallyballs, he managed to spill his drink on himself at the fancy dinner.
